extra_descriptions.description:
I am not sure about all information in this book, because the adventurer
who told me the story was not...........................................
Firstly you will need a dress for the keeper. You may find a suitable
dress in the general store in New Thalos area. Say to shopkeeper keeper
( say keeper) and he will help you. Now you need a beautiful rug for the
Fireflash who has the key of kassandra. Fireflash interests only with special
rug which has been sold by grocer in Valley of Titans area. Now, you
should find the keeper who will unlocks the gate to you against the
dress. I don't know the exact place of the keeper and Fireflash,
but I heard that they are in an area which includes many pixies and
dragons. As you give the dress to keeper he will helps you. And now you
should give rug to Fireflash. Now you have a key find the Paladin who is
responsible for the stone kassandra. Adventured said me that you may find
that paladin in the south and up of the Midgaard.
        Usage of the kassandra is very easy, as you are holding it say :
"  kassandra, matandra, or sebat."
eg, say kassandra
    say sebat
